source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_SEQ_00<tab>Lord Drillemont requires your assistance in bringing the heretic masquerading as Inquisitor Guillaime to justice.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_SEQ_00<tab>ホワイトブリム前哨地のドリユモンは、冒険者に偽のギイェームを捕らえる手伝いをしてほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_SEQ_01<tab>Lord Drillemont has asked you to accompany him to Snowcloak, where the heretic masquerading as Inquisitor Guillaime is said to be conducting another interrogation. If the impostor refuses to surrender, Lord Drillemont intends to use force. Prepare for the worst and rendezvous with the knights at Snowcloak.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_SEQ_01<tab>ギイェームは異端審問をするため、前哨地を出ていったのだという。ギイェームを捕らえるため、スノークローク大氷壁にいる「デュランデル家の騎兵」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_SEQ_02<tab>Faced with Lord Drillemont's accusations, the false inquisitor declares that he cannot betray that which he owes no allegiance, and that all Ishgardians must be held to account for their persecution of the heretics. With that, he summons his Dravanian allies and endeavors to defend himself, going so far as to use his magicks to assume the form of a dragon. The ruse serves only to anger Lord Drillemont, however, and with his aid you dispel the heretic's glamour and slay his scalekin accomplices. Defiant to the last, the nameless heretic rejoices in the vengeance he wreaked, predicting with his dying breath that you will meet your end in the Stone Vigil. Return to Whitebrim Front and inform Alphinaud of the impostor's demise.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_SEQ_02<tab>見事、偽の異端審問官ギイェームを倒した。ホワイトブリム前哨地に戻り、「アルフィノ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_SEQ_03<tab>Alphinaud refuses to revel in your victory over the false inquisitor, declaring that there will be time enough to celebrate when the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> has been secured. Happily, your path into the Stone Vigil now seems clear. All that remains is for you and your companions to pay one final visit to Lord Drillemont.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_SEQ_03<tab>冒険者の活躍によって、事件は解決した。飛空艇「エンタープライズ」の回収は、もう目前だ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the knight of House Durendaire.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_TODO_00<tab>デュランデル家の騎兵と話す

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_000<tab>That thrice-damned heretic has murdered countless innocents, and made a mockery of our laws! Hells take him and his Dravanian allies!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_000ギイェームめ、まさか偽者だったとは……。
奴は、次の異端審問を行うと言って出かけていった。
おそらく……また罪なき神民の命を奪う気だ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_001<tab>I am told he makes for Snowcloak even now, intending to pass judgment upon yet another poor soul whom he has branded heretic. If we hurry, there may still be time to prevent further tragedy.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_001奴が異端者ならば、ドラゴン族の力を使う可能性もある。
それでも、応援を要請している場合ではない……！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_002<tab>Lend me your strength, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Together, let us put an end to this impostor's heresy once and for all!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_002頼む、私と共に「スノークローク大氷壁」へ赴き、
偽りの異端審問を止めてくれ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_NPCA_000_010<tab>Good to have you with us, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. When Lord Drillemont arrives, we are to confront the inquisitor. If he refuses to go quietly, we will need to use force. Are you prepared for that eventuality?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_NPCA_000_010間もなく、ドリユモン隊長も到着します！
奴を取り押さえる準備はいいですか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_020<tab>You needn't tremble so, my child. The righteous shall enjoy everlasting peace in Halone's halls. Only the wicked─
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_020恐れることはありません。
アナタが無実の徒であるならば、魂は神に救われましょう。
ですが、もしも神に背いていれば……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_NPCB_000_021<tab>But why!? Why must I die!? By all that is holy, I swear to you that I have <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> questioned the teachings of Halone!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_NPCB_000_021ち、違います！
私は異端なんかじゃ……ハルオーネ様の教えを信じて……！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_022<tab>Inquisitor! Release the maid and come with us!
target: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_022<tab>そこまでだ、ギイェーーームッ！！！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_023<tab>My lord Drillemont─what is the meaning of this interruption? You are aware that I am at present conducting an interrogation, are you not?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_023これは、ドリユモン卿……。
そのように声を荒らげて、いったい何事です？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_024<tab>Silence, villain! I name thee <var 1A 02 /var>heretic<var 1A 01 /var>, murderer of Inquisitor Guillaime and countless innocents!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_024茶番は終わりだ。
我々はお前の策略に、踊らされていた……
だが、この聡い冒険者がすべてを見破ったのだ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_025<tab>You are a traitor to Ishgard, to your own kith and kin! Your sins are beyond measure─beyond redemption!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_025異端者が異端審問官を名乗るとは、なんと罪深い！
イシュガルドの民の使命を棄て、
ドラゴン族に与する悪党よ……お前を制裁するッ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_026<tab>Ah...grave allegations indeed. But you will find your logic is flawed. How can I betray that which I owe no allegiance? No, Lord Drillemont─my conscience is quite clear, I assure you.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_026イシュガルドの民の使命、ですか……。
くくく……はは……はははははははははッ……！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_027<tab>I wonder...can you say the same? You whose hands are black with the blood of those whose only <var 1A 02 /var>sin<var 1A 01 /var> was to question your nation's crazed crusade!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_027貴様らは何年それを続けてきた！？
子に、孫に、いつまで不毛な宿命を負わせるつもりだ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_028<tab>You speak to me of Ishgardian <var 1A 02 /var>innocents<var 1A 01 /var>? Hah! <var 1A 02 /var>All<var 1A 01 /var> are complicit in these crimes, for <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> live their lives by the archbishop's lies.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_028慣習に縛られ、道を模索することもなく、
この国はとうに腐りはてた。
なればこそ、我が手で、竜の牙で、変革を起こすのだ！！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_029<tab>But I know you will not hear me, deafened by dogma as you are. If you desire retribution, Lord Drillemont, then come─let us see how Ishgardian steel fares against Dravanian fang and claw!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_029来い、騎士ども！　そして無謀な冒険者よ！
貴様らが恐れる竜の力で、八つ裂きにしてくれるッ！

TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_040ウ……ぐ、ガァ……ッ！
ドラゴン族の……チカラ、が……ッ……！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_041<tab>Your plans lie in ruin, heretic. Choose your words wisely, for they will be your last.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_041<tab>ここまでだ、名も知れぬ異端者よ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_042<tab><cough> <wheeze> Hah hah... You may not recall the many Ishgardians I have sentenced, but the families of the dead will <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> forget. Blood has been repaid with blood, and for that I am content.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_042ぐ……はぁ……はぁ……。
アインハルト家の力は衰え……名家の均衡は、崩れた……
混乱が起きる……十分……だろう……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_043<tab>My...my only regret is that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> yet live...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_043冒険者よ……貴様だけは……想定外だった……。
やはり、騎士などより……よほど恐ろしいな……
外の……者は…………。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_044<tab>But your end is nigh, foreigner. The dragons within the Stone Vigil will rend you asunder. And when you are dead, Whitebrim Front shall fall...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_000_044……忘れるな…………。
竜の牙は……いつでも貴様らの、腐った喉元に……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_045<tab>Defiant to the last. Leave the body for the crows─his ilk deserves naught better.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_045今は不毛に思えようとも、いつか必ずドラゴン族を滅ぼす。
流れた同志の血と、都市民の涙に報いることができるのは、
我らの剣だけなのだ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_046<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I must apologize for involving you in this sordid business. You should never have been asked to intervene in Ishgardian affairs of state.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_046すまない、冒険者よ。
これは我らの都市の問題、お前が気にすることでは……

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_047<tab>Rest assured, I have not forgotten the matter which first brought you into our midst. It is past time that you were reunited with your airship.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_047いや、もはや意固地になる意味もない。
ホワイトブリム前哨地に戻り、
お前の仲間も交えて話すとしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_048<tab>But this is not the place to discuss such matters. Pray visit me at Whitebrim Front─and bring your associates.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_000_048我らが抱える問題と、
お前たちの飛空艇「エンタープライズ」の話だ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>Where have you been, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? ...Hm? The false inquisitor has been slain, has he? Yes, well, his was a tale always like to end in bloodshed.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_ALPHINAUD_000_050偽の異端審問官を討ったのか！
これで、問題もひと段落というわけだな……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_ALPHINAUD_000_051<tab>Though you have overcome the latest in a long line of unfortunate impediments, I would ask you not to revel in your victory just yet.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_ALPHINAUD_000_051飛空艇の捜索が簡単だとは思っていなかったが、
まさか、これほど苦労しようとは。
イシュガルドの抱える闇、推して知るべしか……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_ALPHINAUD_000_052<tab>We can celebrate once we have secured the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_ALPHINAUD_000_052ともかく、君の活躍でここまで漕ぎ着けたのだ。
飛空艇「エンタープライズ」は、もう目前だぞ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Show the heretic no mercy! He must pay for the innocent blood he has spilled!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_BATTLETALK_01ついに本性を現したな。
罪咎の制裁、受けてもらうぞ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Ignorant swine! Soon you will know the futility of your faith!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_02それが愚かなのだ……。
人の無力さ、思い知らせてやろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Do you see, heretic? You and your allies are no match for the might of Ishgard!
target: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_BATTLETALK_03<tab>観念しろ、竜の眷属など我らの敵ではないッ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_04<tab>How wrong you are, Ishgardian! I have been blessed with power far beyond your ken!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_04浅い……浅い、浅いッ！　貴様らは何もかもが浅すぎるッ！
人は決してドラゴンに敵わぬ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_05<tab>Come, my brothers─grant me the strength to smite our enemies!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_05この戦いが、いかに無意味なものか教えてやろう！
竜より授かりし力……「ドラゴンブラッド」によってッ！！

TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_06ギギギ、グググッ……グオォォォォォ！
……さあ……この力に……抗ってみるがいい……！

TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_BATTLETALK_07竜の眷属に姿を変えた！？
異端の術か……気をつけろ、冒険者！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_08<tab>A <var 1A 02 /var>dragon<var 1A 01 /var> stands before you, yet still you do not flee!?
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_BATTLETALK_09<tab>Your magicks have no power over me, heretic!
target: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_BATTLETALK_09<tab>なめるなよ……我々の力を！　戦いの歴史を！
TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_HP20<tab>ググ……ガァッ……貴様ら如きにィィィ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Ugh...I swear by the Fury, I will bury my blade into...your...
target: TEXT_GAIUSC004_00941_DRILLEMONT_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>くっ……騎士が無力を、認めるわけには……。
